products.title: Aria Vapour 89mm Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Aria Vapour 89mm Vertical Blind in Grey. Made to measure from £14.14 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This 89mm Vertical Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Aria range comes in many different colours and has a perfect pattern which gives it more a sophisticated look to any room they are fitted in. 
 
This grey vertical blind is the perfect match for any room to add a cool and stylish feel. 
 
 Product ID: SDB-VTB0926 Fabric Colour: Vapour Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: White Slimline Headrail Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top or Face Fixable     Slat Width: 89mm Control Type: Smooth Chain Operation with Cord tilt OR Wand Tilt and Pull Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Aria Cape 89mm Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Aria Cape 89mm Vertical Blind in White. Made to measure from £14.14 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This 89mm Vertical Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Aria range comes in many different colours and has a perfect pattern which gives it more a sophisticated look to any room they are fitted in. 
 
This white vertical blind is the perfect neutral that will look great in any window in any room. With a subtle yet stylish pattern, our Aria blind is a great choice.

products.title: Lunaria Sunflower Roller Blind

products.title: Aria Cape
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Aria Cape Standard Vertical Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Standard Vertical Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
Min Width: 250mm Max Width: 5000mm
 	Min Drop: 500mm Max Drop: 3500mm
 	Fabric Composition: Polyester
 	Louvre Width: 89mm
 	Guarantee: 12 Months
 	Fittings: Included
 	Controls: Cord control to open/close and beaded chrome chain to tilt louvres, or wand control to open/close and twist wand to tilt louvres.
 	Stack: A choice of left, right or split.
 	Louvres: Louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.

products.title: Azaria Citrine
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Azaria Citrine Deluxe Roman Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Deluxe Roman Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
Min Width: 350mm Max Width: 1320mm (with join 2500mm)
 	Min Drop: 400mm Max Drop: 2500mm
 	Fabric Composition: 100% Cotton
 	Guarantee: 12 Months
 	Controls: Sidewinder control.
 	Fabric Lining: Fully lined as standard, blackout and interlining available.
 	Fixings: Fixing brackets included.
 	Headrail: Robust aluminium headrail, 40mm wide x 40mm deep.
 	Finish: Fabric attached to headrail with velcro.
